Date & Time

Date Selection

Shown are multiple states for the calendar date range selection.
The calednar date selection should be used in tables to select a date range to be viewed. No other buttons should be added onto the calendar date range selection (for example: “clear”, “this week”, etc).

Static Calendar

User is allowed to select a date range from today’s date through future dates. This is the static state where nothing is selected.

Same convention as before for hovering over the next date, the font color changes to blue. The user is also shown a bridge between the two dates in a lighter version of the highlight blue (#3FA9F5 at 20% opactiy).

This shows when the user has selected the full date range. If they want to select a new date range, they do not have to clear it - once they make another click it will reset the range.
